content:
ere is a gross injustice in the existing state of the law. And it shows also
that the groups currently working against liberalization of abortion laws, in
fact working toward having it declared unconstitutional for a state to permit
abortion, had better start working for the adoption of Good Samaritan laws
generally, or earn the charge that they are acting in bad faith.
I should think, myself, that Minimally Decent Samaritan laws would be
one thing, Good Samaritan laws quite another, and in fact
